text: Need Ava Johnson for Commonwealth Bank campaign. Budget around $9,315, looking for 1 x Lifestyle photography, 3 x 2-minute tutorial, 3 x Press release quote, 1 x Facebook post, 2 x Press release quote. 9 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 8 months. Engagement period: 6 months. Need to sort out: TBC on final dates
